DESCRIPTION: TODO: Make your own epic keywords
Cards that are not native to The Uma, such as cards from other characters, colorless cards, statuses, or curses.

Your current #yMood affects outgoing damage and Energy gain on turn start.  Awful: #b-2 Damage and #b-1 Energy  Bad: #b-1 Damage  Normal: #b0 Good: #b+1 Damage Great: #b+2 Damage and #b+1 Energy. If you end combat at #bAwful mood, there is a #b1 in #b4 chance a random #yCurse is added to your deck.
